title: Thanks for screwing me rito
body: So I'm playing a game right? lvl 1 game just started then boom. attempting to reconnect. so i disconnect and reconnect so i don't feed or hurt my team. IT WOULDN'T LET ME so when i did reconnect everyone was lvl 13 and we pretty much lost the game because my sup was all by themselves getting destroyed by the enemy ashe. It happened to the enemy support too. AND TOO TOP IT OFF AFTER GAME I GOT LEAVERBUSTER. IM DONE RIOT BYE{{champion:32}}
